EmojiPicker--empty.description: Shown in the emoji picker when a search yields 0 results.

EmojiPicker--search-placeholder.description: Shown as a placeholder inside the emoji picker search field.

EmojiPicker--skin-tone.description: Shown as a tooltip over the emoji tone buttons.

Message--from-me-unsupported-message.message: One of your devices sent a message that can't be processed or displayed because it uses a new OfficeApp feature.

Message--from-me-unsupported-message-ask.message: Future messages like this will be synchronized now that you are using an up-to-date version of OfficeApp.

Message--tap-to-view--incoming.description: Text shown on messages with with individual timers, before user has viewed it

Message--tap-to-view--outgoing.description: Text shown on outgoing messages with with individual timers (inaccessble)

Message--tap-to-view-expired.description: Text shown on messages with with individual timers, after user has viewed it

Message--unsupported-message.message: $contact$ sent you a message that can't be processed or displayed because it uses a new OfficeApp feature.

Message--unsupported-message-ask-to-rese.message: You can ask $contact$ to re-send this message now that you are using an up-to-date version of OfficeApp.

Message--update-signal.description: Text for a button which will take user to OfficeApp download page

aboutSignalDesktop.description: Item under the Help menu, which opens a small about window

acceptNewKey.description: Label for a button to accept a new safety number

aceptedInvitation.description: Accept invitation button on import contact

address.description: Generic label shown if contact address has custom type but no label

allowAccess.description: Button shown in popup asking to enable microphon/video permissions to send audio messages

androidMessageLengthWarning.message: Clientes de Android solo recibirán los primeros 2000 caracteres de este mensaje
androidMessageLengthWarning.description: Warning that long messages could not get received completely by Android clients.

appMenuHide.description: Application menu command to hide the window

appMenuHideOthers.description: Application menu command to hide all other windows

appMenuQuit.description: Application menu command to close the application

appMenuUnhide.description: Application menu command to show all application windows

appTagLineSecond.description: second Tagline of the OfficeApp application

archiveConversation.description: Shown in menu for conversation, and moves conversation out of main conversation list

archiveHelperText.message: Deze gesprekken worden gearchiveerd en zullen alleen in Postvak IN verschijnen als je nieuwe berichten ontvangt.
archiveHelperText.description: Shown at the top of the archived converations list in the left pane

archivedConversations.description: Shown in place of the search box when showing archived conversation list

attemptingReconnection.message: Poging tot opnieuw verbinden over $reconnect_duration_in_seconds$ seconden

audio.description: Shown in a quotation of a message containing an audio attachment if no text was originally provided with that attachment

audioPermissionNeeded.message: Om een audiobericht te versturen moet je OfficeApp Desktop toegang tot de microfoon geven.
audioPermissionNeeded.description: Shown if the user attempts to send an audio message without audio permssions turned on

autoUpdateNewVersionInstructions.message: Klik op ‘OfficeApp herstarten’ om de updates toe te passen.

autoUpdateNewVersionMessage.message: Er is een nieuwe versie van OfficeApp beschikbaar.

bankDetails.description: Title for company bank detail input

callPhone.description: Label for phone verify call phone

cannotMixImageAdnNonImageAttachments.message: Je kunt geen combinatie van afbeeldingen en niet-afbeeldingen insluiten als bijlagen van één bericht.
cannotMixImageAdnNonImageAttachments.description: An error popup when the user has attempted to add an attachment

cannotUpdate.description: Shown as the title of our update error dialogs on windows

cannotUpdateDetail.message: OfficeApp Desktop failed to update, but there is a new version available. Please go to https://signal.org/download and install the new version manually, then either contact support or file a bug about this problem.
cannotUpdateDetail.description: Shown if a general error happened while trying to install update package

changeLanguageMessage.message: Changing current language requires restarting the application, do you wish to do this now?
changeLanguageMessage.description: Message for change language require restart message box

changeLanguageTitle.description: Title for change language requires restart message box

changedRecently.message: Je veiligheidsnummer met $name$ is onlangs veranderd. Dit kan betekenen dat iemand je gesprekken probeert te onderscheppen, of gewoonweg dat $name$ OfficeApp opnieuw heeft geïnstalleerd.
changedRecently.description: Shown on confirmation dialog when user attempts to send a message

changedRecentlyMultiple.message: Je veiligheidsnummers met meerdere groepsleden zijn recentelijk veranderd. Dit kan betekenen dat iemand je gesprekken probeert te onderscheppen, of gewoonweg dat sommige groepsleden OfficeApp opnieuw hebben geïnstalleerd.
changedRecentlyMultiple.description: Shown on confirmation dialog when user attempts to send a message

changedRightAfterVerify.message: Het veiligheidsnummer dat je wilt verifiëren is veranderd. Controleer je nieuwe veiligheidsnummer met $name$. Let op: dit kan betekenen dat iemand je gesprekken probeert te onderscheppen, of gewoonweg dat $name$ OfficeApp opnieuw heeft geïnstalleerd.
changedRightAfterVerify.description: Shown on the safety number screen when the user has selected to verify/unverify a contact's safety number, and we immediately discover a safety number change

changedSinceVerified.message: Je veiligheidsnummer met $name$ is veranderd sinds de laatste verificatie. Dit kan betekenen dat iemand je gesprekken probeert te onderscheppen, of gewoonweg dat $name$ OfficeApp opnieuw heeft geïnstalleerd.
changedSinceVerified.description: Shown on confirmation dialog when user attempts to send a message

changedSinceVerifiedMultiple.message: Je veiligheidsnummers met meerdere groepsleden zijn veranderd sinds de laatste verificatie. Dit kan betekenen dat iemand je gesprekken probeert te onderscheppen, of gewoonweg dat sommige groepsleden OfficeApp opnieuw hebben geïnstalleerd.
changedSinceVerifiedMultiple.description: Shown on confirmation dialog when user attempts to send a message

checkNetworkConnection.description: Obvious instructions for when a user's computer loses its network connection

chooseDeviceName.message: Kies de naam van dit apparaat
chooseDeviceName.description: The header shown on the 'choose device name' screen in the device linking process

chooseDirectory.description: Button to allow the user to find a folder on disk

chooseFile.description: Button to allow the user to find a file on disk

clearDataButton.description: Button in the settings dialog starting process to delete all data

clearDataExplanation.message: Dit verwijdert alle gegevens in de toepassing, verwijdert alle berichten en opgeslagen accountinformatie.
clearDataExplanation.description: Text describing what the clear data button will do.

clearDataHeader.description: Header in the settings dialog for the section dealing with data deletion

companyRegistrationID.description: Label for commercial register id input

confirmation-dialog--Cancel.description: Appears on the cancel button in confirmation dialogs.

connecting.description: Displayed when the desktop client is currently connecting to the server.

contactAvatarAlt.description: Used in the alt tag for the image avatar of a contact

contactsHeader.description: Shown to separate the types of search results

continueButton.description: Button label for continuing to next step

conversationsHeader.description: Shown to separate the types of search results

copyErrorAndQuit.description: Shown in the top-level error popup, allowing user to copy the error text and close the app

dangerousFileType.message: Type bijlage niet toegestaan wegens veiligheidsredenen
dangerousFileType.description: Shown in toast when user attempts to send .exe file, for example

databaseError.description: Shown in a popup if the database cannot start up properly

debugLog.description: View menu item to open the debug log (title case)

debugLogError.message: Er is iets misgegaan bij het uploaden. Voeg het logbestand handmatig toe aan het foutrapport.

debugLogExplanation.message: Deze log zal online publiek beschikbaar gemaakt worden voor de ontwikkelaars. Controleer en wijzig deze zo nodig voor het verzenden.

deleteAllDataBody.message: Je staat op het punt alle opgeslagen accountgegevens van deze toepassing te wissen, inclusief alle contacten en alle berichten. Je kunt altijd opnieuw koppelen met je mobiele apparaat, maar je gewiste berichten kunnen niet hersteld worden.
deleteAllDataBody.description: Text describing what exactly will happen if the user clicks the button to delete all data

deleteAllDataButton.description: Text of the button that deletes all data

deleteAllDataHeader.description: Header of the full-screen delete data confirmation screen

deleteAllDataProgress.message: Verbinding wordt verbroken en alle gegevens worden verwijderd
deleteAllDataProgress.description: Message shown to user when app is disconnected and data deleted

deleteAndRestart.description: Shown in a popup if the database cannot start up properly; allows user to dalete database and restart

deleteConversationConfirmation.description: Confirmation dialog text that asks the user if they really wish to delete the conversation. Answer buttons use the strings 'ok' and 'cancel'. The deletion is permanent, i.e. it cannot be undone.

deleteMessage.description: Shown on the drop-down menu for an individual message, deletes single message

deleteMessages.description: Menu item for deleting messages, title case.

deleteWarning.message: Weet je het zeker? Door op ‘Wissen’ te klikken, wordt dit bericht voorgoed van enkel dit apparaat gewist.

deviceName.description: The label in settings panel shown for the user-provided name for this desktop instance

disabledDisappearingMessages.description: Displayed in the conversation list when the timer is turned off

disappearingMessages.description: Conversation menu option to enable disappearing messages

disappearingMessagesDisabled.description: Displayed in the left pane when the timer is turned off

disconnected.description: Displayed when the desktop client cannot connect to the server.

documents.description: Header of the secondary pane in the media gallery, showing every non-media attachment

documentsEmptyState.message: Je hebt geen documenten in dit gesprek
documentsEmptyState.description: Message shown to user in the media gallery when there are no messages with document attachments (anything other than images or video)

downloadAttachment.description: Shown in a message's triple-dot menu if there isn't room for a dedicated download button

downloading.description: Shown in the message bubble while a long message attachment is being downloaded

editMenuCopy.description: Edit menu command to add selected text to clipboard

editMenuCut.description: Edit menu command to remove selected text and add it to clipboard

editMenuDelete.description: Edit menu command to remove the selected text

editMenuPaste.description: Edit menu command to insert text from clipboard at cursor location

editMenuPasteAndMatchStyle.description: Edit menu command to insert text from clipboard at cursor location, taking only text and not style information

editMenuRedo.description: Edit menu command to restore previously undone typed text

editMenuSelectAll.description: Edit menu comand to select all of the text in selected text box

editMenuStartSpeaking.description: Edit menu item under 'speech' to start dictation

editMenuStopSpeaking.description: Edit menu item under 'speech' to stop dictation

editMenuUndo.description: Edit menu command to remove recently-typed text

email.description: Generic label shown if contact email has custom type but no label

eulaSubTitle.message: To continue, read and accept the terms and conditions

expiredWarning.message: Deze versie van OfficeApp Desktop is verouderd. Opwaardeer naar de laatste versie om verder te chatten.
expiredWarning.description: Warning notification that this version of the app has expired

failedToSend.message: Verzenden naar bepaalde ontvangers mislukt. Controleer je netwerkverbinding.

fileIconAlt.description: Used in the media gallery documents tab to visually represent a file

fileSizeWarning.message: Sorry, het geselecteerde bestand overschrijdt de maximale grootte.

finishLinkingPhone.description: The text on the button to finish the linking process, after choosing the device name

from.description: Label for the sender of a message

general.description: Header for general options on the settings screen

goToForums.description: Item under the Help menu, takes you to the forums

goToSupportPage.description: Item under the Help menu, takes you to the support page

gotIt.description: Label for a button that dismisses a dialog. The user clicks it to confirm that they understand the message in the dialog.

hide.description: Command in the tray icon menu, to hide the window

hideMenuBar.description: Label text for menu bar visibility setting

home.description: Shown on contact detail screen as a label for an address/phone/email

hoursAgo.description: Contracted form of 'X hours ago' which works both for singular and plural

hoursAgoShort.description: Even further contracted form of 'X hours ago' which works both for singular and plural, used in the left pane

identityChanged.message: Je veiligheidsnummer met deze contactpersoon is veranderd. Dit kan betekenen dat iemand je gesprekken probeert te onderscheppen, of gewoonweg dat je contactpersoon OfficeApp opnieuw heeft geïnstalleerd. Het wordt aanbevolen om het nieuwe veiligheidsnummer hieronder met deze persoon te verifiëren.

identityKeyErrorOnSend.message: Je veiligheidsnummer met $name$ is veranderd. Dit kan betekenen dat iemand je gesprekken probeert te onderscheppen, of gewoonweg dat $name$ OfficeApp opnieuw heeft geïnstalleerd. Het wordt aanbevolen je nieuwe veiligheidsnummer met dit contactpersoon te verifiëren.
identityKeyErrorOnSend.description: Shown when user clicks on a failed recipient in the message detail view after an identity key change

imageAttachmentAlt.description: Used in alt tag of image attachment

imageCaptionIconAlt.message: Pictogram dat laat zien dat deze afbeelding een bijschrift heeft
imageCaptionIconAlt.description: Used for the icon layered on top of an image in message bubbles

imageFailedToLoad.description: When an image attachment is missing, this message is shown

importAgain.message: Kies een map en probeer het opnieuw
importAgain.description: Button shown if the user runs into an error during import, allowing them to start over

importChooserTitle.description: Title of the popup window used to select data previously exported

importCompleteHeader.description: Header shown on the screen at the end of a successful import process

importCompleteLinkButton.message: Koppel dit apparaat aan je telefoon
importCompleteLinkButton.description: Button shown at end of successful 'light' import process, so the standard linking process still needs to happen

importCompleteStartButton.description: Button shown at end of successful import process, nothing left but a restart

importErrorFirst.message: Zorg dat je de juiste map met je opgeslagen OfficeApp-gegevens kiest. De naam begint normaal gezien met ‘OfficeApp Export’. Je kunt ook een nieuwe kopie van je gegevens uit de Chrome-app opslaan.
importErrorFirst.description: Message shown if the import went wrong; first paragraph

importErrorHeader.description: Header of the error screen after a failed import

importErrorSecond.message: Dien een debuglog in als deze methode niet werkt (Weergave -> Foutopsporingslogboek), zodat we je kunnen helpen bij de migratie!
importErrorSecond.description: Message shown if the import went wrong; second paragraph

importingHeader.message: Contacten en berichten aan het laden
importingHeader.description: Header of screen shown as data is import

incomingError.message: Fout bij het verwerken van een inkomend bericht

initialSync.description: Shown during initial link while contacts and groups are being pulled from mobile device

installConnectionFailed.description: Displayed when we can't connect to the server.

installTagline.message: Privacy is mogelijk. OfficeApp maakt het gemakkelijk.
installTagline.description: Tagline displayed under 'installWelcome' string on the install page

installTooManyDevices.message: Sorry, je hebt te veel apparaten gekoppeld. Probeer er enkele te verwijderen.

installWelcome.description: Welcome title on the install page

invalidNumberError.description: When a person inputs a number that is invalid

isNotVerified.message: Je hebt je veiligheidsnummer met $name$ niet geverifieerd.
isNotVerified.description: Summary state shown at top of the safety number screen if user has not verified contact.

isVerified.message: Je hebt je veiligheidsnummer met $name$ geverifieerd.
isVerified.description: Summary state shown at top of the safety number screen if user has verified contact.

joinedTheGroup.message: $name$ is lid geworden van de groep
joinedTheGroup.description: Shown in the conversation history when a single person joins the group

justNow.description: Shown if a message is very recent, less than 60 seconds old

labelChangeLanguage.description: Label for Change Language menu entry

lastSynced.description: Label for date and time of last sync operation

learnMore.message: Lees meer over het verifiëren van veiligheidsnummers
learnMore.description: Text that links to a support article on verifying safety numbers

leftTheGroup.description: Shown in the conversation history when a single person leaves the group

lightboxImageAlt.description: Used in the alt tag for the image shown in a full-screen lightbox view

linkNewDevice.description: The menu option shown in OfficeApp iOS to add a new linked device

linkYourPhone.message: Koppel je telefoon aan OfficeApp Desktop
linkYourPhone.description: Shown on the front page when the application first starst, above the QR code

linkedDevices.description: Used in the guidance to help people find the 'link new device' area of their OfficeApp mobile app

loadDataDescription.message: Je hebt net de exportprodedure doorlopen, en je contacten en berichten wachten geduldig op je computer. Kies de map die je opgeslagen OfficeApp-gegevens bevat.
loadDataDescription.description: Introduction to the process of importing messages and contacts from disk

loadDataHeader.description: Header shown on the first screen in the data import process

loading.description: Message shown on the loading screen before we've loaded any messages

loadingMessages.message: Berichten worden geladen, $count$ tot nu toe…
loadingMessages.description: Message shown on the loading screen when we're catching up on the backlog of messages

loadingPreview.description: Shown while OfficeApp Desktop is fetching metadata for a url in composition area

mainMenuEdit.description: The label that is used for the Edit menu in the program main menu. The '&' indicates that the following letter will be used as the keyboard 'shortcut letter' for accessing the menu with the Alt-<letter> combination.

mainMenuFile.description: The label that is used for the File menu in the program main menu. The '&' indicates that the following letter will be used as the keyboard 'shortcut letter' for accessing the menu with the Alt-<letter> combination.

mainMenuHelp.description: The label that is used for the Help menu in the program main menu. The '&' indicates that the following letter will be used as the keyboard 'shortcut letter' for accessing the menu with the Alt-<letter> combination.

mainMenuSettings.description: The label that is used for the Preferences menu in the program main menu. This should be consistent with the standard naming for ‘Preferences’ on the operating system.

mainMenuView.description: The label that is used for the View menu in the program main menu. The '&' indicates that the following letter will be used as the keyboard 'shortcut letter' for accessing the menu with the Alt-<letter> combination.

mainMenuWindow.description: The label that is used for the Window menu in the program main menu. The '&' indicates that the following letter will be used as the keyboard 'shortcut letter' for accessing the menu with the Alt-<letter> combination.

maximumAttachments.message: Je kunt niet nog meer bijlagen toevoegen aan dit bericht.
maximumAttachments.description: An error popup when the user has attempted to add an attachment

me.description: The label for yourself when shown in a group member list

media.description: Header of the default pane in the media gallery, showing images and videos

mediaEmptyState.message: Je hebt geen media in dit gesprek
mediaEmptyState.description: Message shown to user in the media gallery when there are no messages with media attachments (images or video)

mediaMessage.description: Description of a message that has an attachment and no text, displayed in the conversation list as a preview.

mediaPermissionsDescription.message: Geef toestemming om de camera en microfoon te gebruiken
mediaPermissionsDescription.description: Description of the media permission description

membersNeedingVerification.message: Je veiligheidsnummers met deze groepsleden zijn veranderd sinds de laatste verificatie. Klik op een groepslid om je nieuwe veiligheidsnummer met hem te bekijken.
membersNeedingVerification.description: When there are multiple previously-verified group members with safety number changes, a banner will be shown. The list of contacts with safety number changes is shown, and this text introduces that list.

menuReportIssue.description: Item under the Help menu, takes you to GitHub new issue form (title case)

menuSetupAsNewDevice.description: When the application is not yet set up, menu option to start up the set up as fresh device

menuSetupAsStandalone.description: Only available on development modes, menu option to open up the standalone device setup sequence

menuSetupWithImport.description: When the application is not yet set up, menu option to start up the import sequence

message--getDescription--disappearing-ph.description: Shown in notifications and in the left pane when a message is a disappearing photo.

message--getDescription--unsupported-mes.description: Shown in notifications and in the left pane when a message has features too new for this signal install.

message--getNotificationText--stickers.description: Shown in notifications and in the left pane instead of sticker image.

messageBelow.description: Alt text for button to take user down to bottom of conversation with a new message out of screen

messageBodyTooLong.description: Shown if the user tries to send more than 64kb of text

messageFoundButNotLoaded.message: Oorspronkelijk bericht gevonden, maar niet opgehaald. Scroll naar boven om het op te halen.
messageFoundButNotLoaded.description: Shown in toast if user clicks on quote references messages not loaded in view, but in database

messageImportContact.message: Bitte beachten Sie, dass beim Kontaktimport Ihre bereits vorhandenen Kontakte überschrieben werden. Möchten Sie fortfahren?
messageImportContact.description: Message to import new contact list

messagesBelow.description: Alt text for button to take user down to bottom of conversation with more than one message out of screen

messagesHeader.description: Shown to separate the types of search results

migratingToSQLCipher.message: Bezig met optimaliseren van berichten… $status$ voltooid.
migratingToSQLCipher.description: Message shown on the loading screen while we are doing application optimizations

minutesAgo.description: Contracted form of 'X minutes ago' which works both for singular and plural

minutesAgoShort.description: Even further contracted form of 'X minutes ago' which works both for singular and plural, used in the left pane

mobile.description: Shown on contact detail screen as a label for aa phone or email

moreInfo.description: Shown on the drop-down menu for an individual message, takes you to message detail screen

moveConversationToInbox.description: Undoes Archive Conversation action, and moves archived conversation back to the main conversation list

multipleJoinedTheGroup.message: $names$ is lid geworden van de groep
multipleJoinedTheGroup.description: Shown in the conversation history when more than one person joins the group

multipleLeftTheGroup.description: Shown in the conversation history when multiple people leave the group

multipleNoLongerVerified.message: Je veiligheidsnummers met meerdere leden van deze groep zijn veranderd en ze zijn daarom niet langer geverifieerd. Klik om de veiligheidsnummers te tonen.
multipleNoLongerVerified.description: Shown in conversation banner when more than one group member's safety number has changed, but they were previously verified.

nameAndMessage.description: Label for setting notifications to display name and message text

nameOnly.description: Label for setting notifications to display sender name only

newIdentity.description: Header for a key change dialog

newMessage.description: Displayed in notifications for only 1 message

newMessages.description: Displayed in notifications for multiple messages

newPhoneNumber.message: Voer een telefoonnummer in om een contact toe te voegen.
newPhoneNumber.description: Placeholder for adding a new number to a contact

noContactsImported.message: Sie haben keine Kontakte, bitte Kontaktliste importieren.

noLongerVerified.message: Je veiligheidsnummer met $name$ is veranderd en het is daarom niet langer geverifieerd. Klik om het te tonen.
noLongerVerified.description: Shown in converation banner when user's safety number has changed, but they were previously verified.

noNameOrMessage.description: Label for setting notifications to display no name and no message text

noSearchResults.description: Shown in the search left pane when no results were found

notNow.description: Text for skipping actions for now

noteToSelf.description: Name for the conversation with your own phone number

notificationFrom.description: Displayed in notifications when setting is 'name only' and one message is waiting

notificationMostRecent.description: Displayed in notifications when setting is 'name and message' and more than one message is waiting

notificationMostRecentFrom.description: Displayed in notifications when setting is 'name only' and more than one message is waiting

notificationSettingsDialog.message: Toon wanneer een bericht ontvangen wordt meldingen die het volgende weergeven:
notificationSettingsDialog.description: Explain the purpose of the notification settings

offline.description: Displayed when the desktop client has no network connection.

oneNonImageAtATimeToast.message: Wanneer je een bijlage insluit die geen afbeelding is, is de limiet één bijlage per bericht.
oneNonImageAtATimeToast.description: An error popup when the user has attempted to add an attachment

optimizingApplication.description: Message shown on the loading screen while we are doing application optimizations

originalMessageNotAvailable.description: Shown in toast if user clicks on quote that references message no longer in database

originalMessageNotFound.description: Shown in quote if reference message was not found as message was initially downloaded and processed

permissions.description: Header for permissions section of settings

phone.description: Generic label shown if contact phone has custom type but no label

phoneSetupSubtitle.message: Bitte geben Sie Ihre Bürotelefonnummer ein. Sie werden angerufen und erhalten einen Verifikationscode. Dabei können Gebühren anfallen.

photo.description: Shown in a quotation of a message containing a photo if no text was originally provided with that image

plusButton.description: The button used in OfficeApp Android to add a new linked device

poBox.description: When rendering an address, used to provide context to a post office box

previewThumbnail.description: Shown while OfficeApp Desktop is fetching metadata for a url in composition area

privacyPolicy.description: Shown in the about box for the link to https://signal.org/legal

quit.description: Command in the tray icon menu, to quit the application

quoteThumbnailAlt.message: Miniatuur van afbeelding uit aangehaald bericht
quoteThumbnailAlt.description: Used in alt tag of thumbnail images inside of an embedded message quote

readOnlyVolume.message: OfficeApp Desktop is likely in a macOS quarantine, and will not be able to auto-update. Please try moving OfficeApp.app to /Applications with Finder.
readOnlyVolume.description: Shown on MacOS if running on a read-only volume and we cannot update

received.description: Label for the time a message was received

replyToMessage.description: Shown in triple-dot menu next to message to allow user to start crafting a message with a quotation

replyingTo.description: Shown in iOS theme when you or someone quotes to a message which is not from you

reportIssue.description: Link to open the issue tracker

resetSession.description: This is a menu item for resetting the session, using the imperative case, as in a command.

retrySend.description: Shown on the drop-down menu for an indinvidaul message, but only if it is an outgoing message that failed to send

safetyNumberChanged.description: A notification shown in the conversation when a contact reinstalls

safetyNumberChangedGroup.description: A notification shown in a group conversation when a contact reinstalls, showing the contact name

scrollDown.message: Scroll naar de onderkant van het gesprek
scrollDown.description: Alt text for button to take user down to bottom of conversation, shown when user scrolls up

search.description: Placeholder text in the search input

searchForPeopleOrGroups.description: Placeholder text in the search input

selectAContact.message: Selecteer een contactpersoon of groep om een gesprek te openen.

selectedLocation.description: Message shown as the export location if we didn't capture the target directory

sendAgainInvitation.description: send again an invitation button on import contact

sendAnInvitation.description: send an invitation button on import contact

sendAnyway.description: Used on a warning dialog to make it clear that it might be risky to send the message.

sendFailed.description: Shown on outgoing message if it fails to send

sendMessage.description: Placeholder text in the message entry field

sendMessageToContact.description: Shown when you are sent a contact and that contact has a signal account

sendSMSInstead.description: Text for requesting SMS instead of call

sent.description: Label for the time a message was sent

sessionEnded.description: This is a past tense, informational message. In other words, your secure session has been reset.

settings.description: Menu item and header for global settings

show.description: Command under Window menu, to show the window

showLess.description: Hides the details of a key change

showMore.description: Displays the details of a key change

showSettings.description: A button shown in dialog requesting the user to turn on audio permissions

signalDesktopPreferences.description: Title of the window that pops up with OfficeApp Desktop preferences in it

signalSettings.description: Used in the guidance to help people find the 'link new device' area of their OfficeApp mobile app

speech.description: Item under the Edit menu, with 'start/stop speaking' items below it

spellCheck.description: Description of the media permission description

spellCheckDescription.message: Gebruik spellingscontrole voor de tekst in het berichtinvoerveld
spellCheckDescription.description: Description of the media permission description

stagedPreviewThumbnail.description: Shown while OfficeApp Desktop is fetching metadata for a url in composition area

startConversation.description: Label underneath number a user enters that is not an existing contact

stickers--StickerManager--BlessedPacks.description: Shown in the sticker pack manager above the default sticker packs.

stickers--StickerManager--BlessedPacks--.description: Shown in the sticker pack manager when there are no blessed sticker packs available.

stickers--StickerManager--Install.description: Shown in the sticker pack manager next to sticker packs which can be installed.

stickers--StickerManager--InstalledPacks.description: Shown in the sticker pack manager above your installed sticker packs.
Shown in the sticker pack manager when you don't have any installed sticker packs.

stickers--StickerManager--Introduction--.message: Why use words when you can use stickers?
stickers--StickerManager--Introduction--.description: Shown as the body on a tooltip when the user upgrades to a version of OfficeApp supporting stickers.
Shown as the title on a tooltip when the user upgrades to a version of OfficeApp supporting stickers.

stickers--StickerManager--ReceivedPacks.description: Shown in the sticker pack manager above sticker packs which you have received in messages.

stickers--StickerManager--ReceivedPacks-.message: Stickers from incoming messages will appear here
stickers--StickerManager--ReceivedPacks-.description: Shown in the sticker pack manager when you have not received any sticker packs in messages.

stickers--StickerManager--Uninstall.description: Shown in the sticker pack manager next to sticker packs which are already installed.

stickers--StickerManager--UninstallWarni.message: You may not be able to re-install this sticker pack if you no longer have the source message.
stickers--StickerManager--UninstallWarni.description: Shown in the sticker pack manager next to sticker packs which are already installed.

stickers--StickerPicker--DownloadError.message: Some stickers could not be downloaded.
stickers--StickerPicker--DownloadError.description: Shown in the sticker picker when one or more stickers could not be downloaded.

stickers--StickerPicker--DownloadPending.description: Shown in the sticker picker when one or more stickers are still downloading.

stickers--StickerPicker--Empty.description: Shown in the sticker picker when there are no stickers to show.

stickers--StickerPicker--Hint.message: New sticker packs from your messages are available to install
stickers--StickerPicker--Hint.description: Shown in the sticker picker the first time you have received new packs you can install.

stickers--StickerPicker--NoPacks.description: Shown in the sticker picker when there are no installed sticker packs.

stickers--StickerPicker--NoRecents.message: Recently used stickers will appear here.
stickers--StickerPicker--NoRecents.description: Shown in the sticker picker when there are no recent stickers to show.

stickers--StickerPreview--Error.message: Error opening sticker pack. Check your internet connection and try again.
stickers--StickerPreview--Error.description: The message that appears in the sticker preview modal when there is an error.

stickers--StickerPreview--Title.description: The title that appears in the sticker pack preview modal.

stickers--toast--InstallFailed.message: Sticker pack could not be installed
stickers--toast--InstallFailed.description: Shown in a toast if the user attempts to install a sticker pack and it fails

submitDebugLog.description: Menu item and header text for debug log modal (sentence case)

sync.description: Label for contact and group sync settings

syncExplanation.message: Importeer alle OfficeApp-groepen en -contacten van je mobiele apparaat.

syncFailed.message: Importeren mislukt. Zorg ervoor dat je computer en je telefoon met het internet verbonden zijn.
syncFailed.description: Informational text displayed if a sync operation times out.

syncNow.description: Label for a button that syncs contacts and groups from your phone

syncing.description: Label for a disabled sync button while sync is in progress.

theirIdentityUnknown.message: Je hebt nog geen berichten uitgewisseld met deze contactpersoon. Je veiligheidsnummer met hem zal beschikbaar zijn na het eerste bericht.

thisWeek.description: Section header in the media gallery

timerSetOnSync.message: De timer voor zelf-wissende berichten is bijgewerkt naar $time$
timerSetOnSync.description: Message displayed when timer is set on initial link of desktop device.

timerSetTo.description: Displayed in the conversation list when the timer is updated by some automatic action, or in the left pane

timestampFormat_M.description: Timestamp format string for displaying month and day (but not the year) of a date within the current year, ex: use 'MMM D' for 'Aug 8', or 'D MMM' for '8 Aug'.

timestamp_h.description: Brief timestamp for messages sent about one hour ago. Displayed in the conversation list and message bubble.

timestamp_m.description: Brief timestamp for messages sent about one minute ago. Displayed in the conversation list and message bubble.

timestamp_s.description: Brief timestamp for messages sent less than a minute ago. Displayed in the conversation list and message bubble.

titleIsNow.description: Shown in the conversation history when someone changes the title of the group

to.description: Label for the receiver of a message

today.description: Section header in the media gallery

typingAlt.description: Used as the 'title' attibute for the typing animation

unblockGroupToSend.message: Deblokkeer deze groep om een bericht te verzenden.
unblockGroupToSend.description: Brief message shown when trying to message a blocked group

unblockToSend.message: Deblokkeer dit contact om een bericht te verzenden.
unblockToSend.description: Brief message shown when trying to message a blocked number

unknownGroup.description: Shown as the name of a group if we don't have any information about it

unlinkedWarning.message: Koppel OfficeApp Desktop opnieuw aan je mobiele apparaat om verder te kunnen chatten.

unreadMessage.description: Text for unread message separator, just one message

unreadMessages.description: Text for unread message separator, with count

unregisteredUser.description: Error message displayed when sending to an unregistered user.

unsupportedAttachment.message: Niet-ondersteund bestandstype. Klik om op te slaan.

updatedTheGroup.description: Shown in the conversation history when someone updates the group

upgrade.description: Label text for button to upgrade the app to the latest version

upgradingDatabase.message: De database wordt opgewaardeerd. Dit kan even duren…
upgradingDatabase.description: Message shown on the loading screen when we're changing database structure on first run of a new version

uploadAvatarText.message: Bitte Fügen SIE EIN Profilbild HINZU

uploadCard.message: Upload commercial register entries to brands or identity documents to companies.

uploadCompanyAvatarText.message: Bitte Fügen SIE EIN Profilbild Für das unternehmen HINZU

verifyHelp.message: Als je de beveiliging van je eind-tot-eind-versleuteling met $name$ wilt verifiëren, vergelijk je de nummers hierboven met de nummers op hun apparaat.

verifyNewNumber.description: Label on button included with safety number change notification in the conversation

video.description: Shown in a quotation of a message containing a video if no text was originally provided with that video

videoAttachmentAlt.message: Schermafdruk van video toegevoegd aan bericht
videoAttachmentAlt.description: Used in alt tag of video attachment preview

videoScreenshotFailedToLoad.description: When a attachment video screenshot is missing, this message is shown

view.description: Used as a label on a button allowing user to see more information

viewAllMedia.description: This is a menu item for viewing all media (images + video) in a conversation, using the imperative case, as in a command.

viewMenuResetZoom.description: View menu command to go back to the default zoom

viewMenuToggleDevTools.description: View menu command to show or hide the developer tools

viewMenuToggleFullScreen.description: View menu command to enter or leave Full Screen mode

viewMenuZoomIn.description: View menu command to make everything bigger

viewMenuZoomOut.description: View menu command to make everything smaller

voiceMessage.description: Name for a voice message attachment

voiceNoteMustBeOnlyAttachment.message: Een audiobericht moet de enige bijlage zijn die in een bericht is ingesloten.
voiceNoteMustBeOnlyAttachment.description: Shown in toast if tries to record a voice note with any staged attachments

welcomeAdmin.message: Welcome to the OfficeApp. Please enter your code here.

welcomeCompany.message: Welcome to the OfficeApp. Please register your company here.

windowMenuBringAllToFront.description: Window menu command to bring all windows of current applicatinon to front

windowMenuClose.description: Window menu command to close the current window

windowMenuMinimize.description: Window menu command to minimize the current window

windowMenuZoom.description: Window menu command to make the current window the size of the whole screen

work.description: Shown on contact detail screen as a label for an address/phone/email

yesterday.description: Section header in the media gallery

you.description: In Android theme, shown in quote if you or someone else replies to you

youChangedTheTimer.message: Je hebt de timer voor zelf-wissende berichten op $time$gezet
youChangedTheTimer.description: Message displayed when you change the message expiration timer in a conversation.

youDisabledDisappearingMessages.description: Displayed in the conversation list when the timer is turned off

youLeftTheGroup.description: Displayed when a user can't send a message because they have left the group

youMarkedAsNotVerified.message: Je hebt het veiligheidsnummer met $name$ als niet geverifieerd gemarkeerd
youMarkedAsNotVerified.description: Shown in the conversation history when the user marks a contact as not verified, whether on the Safety Number screen or by dismissing a banner or dialog.

youMarkedAsNotVerifiedOtherDevice.message: Je hebt het veiligheidsnummer met $name$ vanaf een ander apparaat als niet geverifieerd gemarkeerd
youMarkedAsNotVerifiedOtherDevice.description: Shown in the conversation history when we discover that the user marked a contact as not verified on another device.

youMarkedAsVerified.message: Je hebt het veiligheidsnummer met $name$ als geverifieerd gemarkeerd
youMarkedAsVerified.description: Shown in the conversation history when the user marks a contact as verified.

youMarkedAsVerifiedOtherDevice.message: Je hebt het veiligheidsnummer met $name$ vanaf een ander apparaat als geverifieerd gemarkeerd
youMarkedAsVerifiedOtherDevice.description: Shown in the conversation history when we discover that the user marked a contact as verified on another device.
